column2: Granna, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I suffer terribly from fibromyalgia and arthritis. I tried almost every pain med and for the most part I either slept through life or it worked about as well as a sugar pill. My doctor suggested a Toradol shot several times and I finally gave in as a last resort (I hate needles!). I was SO glad I did!  It was the best decision I have made with regard to pain management. Before I had even left the doctor's offie I was already feeling some relief...and by the time I got home I felt like I had been given my life back! For the first time in a couple of years I had found relief from the pain.  I slept like a baby last night for the first time in years.  I wish I had been willing to try Toradol sooner! It may not work for some, but it has been a godsend to me. Now my prayers are asking God to please let me live...and thanking him for Toradol.
